name: Hearth of the Purrest
description:
Rescue your animal friends from going feral, but be warned that it's not going to be easy. You will befriend animals, learn their stories, and save them all before it's too late. 

Hearth of the Purrest is a top-down action-adventure/dungeon crawler game. The player controls a cat prince as they try to navigate through levels whilst saving as many endangered animals as they can from the area.
